and

> "Right boss!" Quickstrike replied and walked up to Percepter "So
> Wat'cha doing there?"
> 
> Inferno, as always, was unable to comprehend Hydra's request due to
> his programming.  After making sure the force shields were up and 
at
> full power he proceeded to make sure the doors were all tightly 
sealed.
